website_summaries.verdict: This professional-grade balance ball tops the list for quality, support, and sturdiness in spite of some reported issues common to inflated balance balls. The best available today.
cons: Somewhat slow to inflate to full air capacity

customer_reviews.title: Not round (it's basically egg-shaped) and wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and pumped it up. It's oblong! Also, I ordered a 55 cm and this measures over 62 cm. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joegolfer

customer_reviews.title: Ball? I think not...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this to use at my desk like a chair. I've got a couple other name brand balls as well. This one is thicker. But it's not a ball. It's more of an egg. I'm several days in and it is misshapen. It's oblong, not round. Not really a big deal for what I'm using it for but I don't feel like dealing with returning it and trying another.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far:-)
customer_reviews.text: Got this to add to my wife's collection of exercise balls. So far she's really happy with the size, gives her more options for different types of exercises and because of the larger size it even allows her to use it behind our office desk so she can do "core" work while working and surfing the internet on the computer:-) It seems to be constructed of very durable rubber/plastic. And at 85cm it is substantially larger than my wife's other exercise balls. Definitely a great addition to our workout equipment collection.
customer_reviews.author: CactusJackTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware:
customer_reviews.text: I have never reviewed an item but I was terribly disappointed in this ball. I am an art teacher and I ordered this ball in the spring to use in my classroom for alternative seating. Since it was the end of the year I waited till the next school year to inflate it. The ball must have had some type of defect because it seemed to have a slow leak so I have had to remove it. Teacher's spend so much of their own money to try to create an accommodating learning environment for all, so just in case you were looking at this product, I would not recommend it at all,
customer_reviews.author: Mary G Frei

customer_reviews.title: Burst Suddenly
customer_reviews.text: The ball was fine for about 6 weeks until it burst and dropped me so I hit my head on the edge of a table. I've been using it as a chair. It was not over-inflated nor do I weigh anywhere near 2200 lbs. I typically had to re-inflate it every two weeks but it was fine until all of a sudden it wasn't. It just split suddenly and not along a seam. I wish I could give it five negative stars.
customer_reviews.author: smish

customer_reviews.title: Great product & excellent followup by seller
customer_reviews.text: The product is as high quality as others I've used recently including theraband's more expensive ball. Sellers sent a very helpful followup email with tips and an attached exercise guide that is actually very good. As simple as this item is (basically a balloon), the followup email from the sellers gives some useful and important notes...wait 24 hours to allow ball to stretch before finishing inflation, and a neat and simple trick how to measure if you want it to be the stated size.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert Gator

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate and use. Came with 2 plugs, a pump, and a tool to lift out the plug. Did not come with exercises which was a little disappointing but you can google & YouTube those. Follow inflation instructions. Blow up 80% wait 24hrs then fill up the rest of the way and wait again before using. Make sure you get the right size for your height I'm 5'3" so I got the 55. Also check to see if it's properly inflated for you. Google instructions for that. (90° when sitting)
customer_reviews.author: sharipc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for personal rehab and therapy
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. Love the bright aqua color. Makes me happy. I use it at least twice a day to loosen up my stiff muscles around a knee replacement. I also use it, placed between my back and a wall, to do squats and deep knee bends. The material is thicker than anticipated and makes me feel confident about using it. There is a small flaw on the ball, some loose rubber, but hasn’t affected the usefulness of the ball. The email sent prior to receiving the ball was very helpful. It came with an introduction from the designers and directions on how to inflate the ball. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aukake Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: First impression was wow this is a great ball.. Day 5, the ball isn't round anymore and very lopsided like an egg and keeps deflating. I have been using it on carpet so no it didn't get a hole in it and it hasn't been in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: AZDude

customer_reviews.title: Relieves back pain
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased week and a half ago for girlfriend who is a Nurse and works as case manager for insurance company. She spends long hours at her desk and she was looking for an exercise ball to sit on instead of her chair. Her chair is ergonomic in design but anyone who sits at a desk will tell you that their is no such thing as the perfectly ergonomic chair. She complained of back and neck pain daily. The first day of use with this ball yielded great results. She uses it every day and she has not complained of beck or neck pain since. So thus far I have to say 5+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bridgman

customer_reviews.title: Where's the pump???
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the pump with my ball. Luckily I had the same exact hand pump that came with another, smaller ball I had purchased elsewhere so I used it. I can't return this stupid ball to make them send me one with a pump because I needed it to start PT right away. The ball is, so far, fine but I really hate paying for something I don't get.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Best

customer_reviews.title: The 65cm supports all my weight in the correct position at the perfect height off the floor with my legs in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and 225 lbs carrying twins. This is my birthing/exercise ball. The 65cm supports all my weight in the correct position at the perfect height off the floor with my legs in the correct angle. I also bought the 55cm first because I read that it would be the right height for me, but obviously I had to go to the larger ball because the 55cm would not support my weight and brought my pelvis too far below my knees. Both balls are good quality. Also on a side note, I sprayed them with scotchguard anti static spray so that any cat hair from off my carpet at home would not stick to them and it worked!
customer_reviews.author: srhpppr

customer_reviews.title: Not firm...
customer_reviews.text: The size is accurate, the grip is good. But it's like a week balloon and bulges more than it should. The size is accurate, the grip is good. But it's like a week balloon and bulges more than it should. Update 12/9/2018: I've had this ball for five months now. The more I use it the less I like it. It's just too soft for exercising or just sitting. If you did put 2200 pounds on this ball, as they advertise, then it will be flat against the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate, strong and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you want from an exercise ball! The instructions to inflate were excellent and the pump worked well. To address others' comments - yes, you have to spend a bit of time inflating it with well over a hundred pumps, but the pump requires very little force, so it's easy to just sit down and do this - maybe takes 15 minutes?. I'm old, weak, and have a bum shoulder, and this was still easy. Ball is super strong and not slippery. Just excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: 85 cm is the size of the largest ball at health clubs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a exercise ball that I use at my health club, and it turns out it is 85cm. Most brands sell up to 75 cm, this one goes up to 95 cm, which was too big. The only downside is that the included pump is poorly designed in that the grip is smaller than your hand, so you cannot grip the stationary portion of the pump with your hand, but have to use a few fingers, which makes it tiring to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Whodiini

customer_reviews.title: STAYS INFLATED
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a computer chair, recommended by my physical therapist. That got old and uncomfortable fast! It's in another room and four months later it's still firm. Comes with a manual pump. I'm a senior and had to take a very short break from pumping it up, but preferred that method than using my car tire pressure pump. Much more convenient also.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Colville

customer_reviews.title: It exploded after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: Used as an exercise ball on a regular smooth floor. Zero stars. It burst after one month of use. Like a popped balloon, huge split down the side. We'd bought two and the other one split at the seams . Huge waste of money, terrible product, worse return policy, piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Chasmyn

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball to use during pregnancy to prepare my body for labor. i got on the ball as often as i could and would keep it simple...gently bouncing, making figure 8s and doing pelvic thrusts. fairly easy to use and it held my pregnant weight. I had a fairly quick natural labor (4 hours from start to finish) and this was my first birth! I do attribute some part of this to all the times I did get on the ball prior to labor. unfortunately, my partner deflated it before I made it home from the hospital and I havent been able to use it since. doesnt subtract from the fact that it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PT and Exercise all in one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball because I stopped going to physical therapy (for recovery from back surgery) due to COVID-19 transmission concerns. I used a ball like this for a few therapy exercises at therapy and felt it had other good uses as well (I used to use it at the Gym - which was closed). It has enabled me to complete my Therapy Exercises and allowed me to do some other workout exercises I used to do at the gym. I also started sitting on it at times to increase balance and perfect my posture. The size was as advertised (perfect for my height) and was very easy to pump up. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to replace my desk chair
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and I needed something to replace my desk chair which would force me to sit upight without slouching. The Live Infinitely exercise ball (75 cm) was the perfect replacement chair. The ball is spherical, unlike some that I have bought previously, which were oval. The professional grade material supports my weight at the appropriate height for my desk. Completely satisfied. It is a pleasure to deal with the owners as they follow up to ensure that the correct item was delivered and that it met my satisfaction. Will definitely buy from them in the future - great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gen 3+

customer_reviews.title: Give Me a Chance to Use It
customer_reviews.text: I received this order on Sunday, pumped it up per the instructions and let it sit overnight. I used it for the first time on Monday morning. As I write this, I'll use this again today in my workout. So, based on one entire workout, I'd say I like it. It appears to be made of heavier vinyl than many other exercise balls I've seen and I like the somewhat tacky surface. I'm sure that it will serve me well in the coming months/yeears.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this ball for about a week and so far I’m very happy with the product. It was easy to assemble and arrived well packaged. I ordered the pink ball and the color is pretty true to the picture. It’s like an icy pink. The ball comes with a hand pump to inflate it. I have zero upper body strength so it took me a few minutes to inflate the ball but the pump worked great. I’m currently using the ball in replacement of a chair at my desk. I’ve read reviews saying the ball inflates to an oval, mine is a perfect circle. Sounds like one off situations. Great price for a sturdy workout ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Exercise Ball
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my Physical Therapist for exercising my lower back pain. Has provided pain relief already. I can utilize it for many other purposes as well. Solid thick material makes it very stable to use. Easy to inflate. Nice directions in package. Great customer service by seller via email “tips” prior to receiving it. Inflating to 80% & letting it sit for 24 hours allows it to meet proper size of ball. Very happy with this purchase! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying this ball. I was not disappointed with what I received! My daughter loves the ball, she uses it for exercise and to sit on to do her homework. I wanted one that would be durable and high enough for her to sit on and be at comparable height as our table. My daughter has ADD and sitting on the yoga ball helps her to focus when doing her homework. This meets our needs and expectations perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R. Jessup

customer_reviews.title: good ball
customer_reviews.text: it’s great! just what i was hoping for as far as size, quality and color. i got the light pink one and it’s a nice muted soft pink, very pretty and very durable. it’s also been very helpful for posture when used as a desk chair. i only gave it four stars for pain relief cause technically i fell off it this morning trying to stretch my back and bruised my hip lol. helps relieve most pain, may cause pain if user is clumsy
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: So sad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the ball for 6 weeks. Used it maybe 4 times. It blew up really nicely and seemed to be well made. Yesterday I found it deflated. My husband blew it back up and overnight it’s flat again:(:(
customer_reviews.author: kjsmith

customer_reviews.title: Back pain at desk improved within minutes
customer_reviews.text: I'm 34 years old and work in finance, so sit at my home office desk for upwards of 8 hours a day. Bought this ball thinking I would use it just occasionally, as I'd started to have hip and back pain. Within minutes of sitting on this, I felt something in back "loosening"/relaxing. My desk-related back pain is 100% gone, no joke. Took me a few tries to get the amount of air right - let some out, put some in - but this process is easy and quick. Also great for midday stretching and core workouts in the office. I've been missing out, for real. I use this exclusively now as my desk chair. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Penner

customer_reviews.title: Deflates constantly. I would say buy a different brand ball.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this ball so much. I have to use it for work since suffering a broken back. It constantly looses air and has to be re-pumped a couple of time during my shift, while on my breaks. This is not how anyone wants to spend their breaks! I would say buy a different brand ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Horrible air pump for carpel tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d known about the hand pump before ordering, I wouldn’t have purchased it. It is not easy to inflate; it is tedious and time consuming for no reason. I don’t have Carpel tunnel but after using this a few minutes, I might. Find one with the foot pump or use an electric air pump to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Coco amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for desk chair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this ball for a couple of years at my work desk to combat sciatica. While changing jobs it was deflated in the garage and my husband accidentally donated it. :/ I've bought this second one and it is still great. I like to roll my hips around and bounce around on it while I work at my desk at home. It's easy to inflate (follow instructions) and is very sturdy and dependable. Using this ball and a standing desk, along with stretching and yoga, I no longer have sciatica.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got the 65 cm ball though I didn't blow it up to the max. I bought a "like new" used ball for about half the price from Amazon warehouse. Was a bit concerned because it was so much cheaper, but the box appeared to never have been opened, everything was included and it definitely was like new. I use my bicycle pump to inflate it as I find the ones included with balance balls are better than nothing, but not easy enough for me to use. Don't think it a flaw in the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavyweight quality ball comparable to the one I use in physical therapy. I anticipate many years of usefulness. The instructions cover exactly the process needed to safely inflate the ball. This involves a 24 hour rest period for the ball; I'm impatient so I was glad when the inflating was over and I could try it out. There is great support from the sellers, they supply a lot of extra information and exercise instructions, they want everyone to be pleased with their equipment and benefit from the use.
customer_reviews.author: BLF

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase of the exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased and received the exercise ball and am satisfied with the purchase. It was easy to inflate and the associated video was quite helpful. I took it into my Physical Therapist and she finished inflating the ball. We did my session using the ball and she was impressed with it. So, I'm happy with it so far. I will update this review if I have any issues with it in future. The only issue that we had was removal of the pin when we needed to inflate it further. I probably need to re-watch the video to get pointers on how to remove the pin.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRead

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball 2 years ago and it still works perfectly. I absolutely love this product it is amazing. I used it through two pregnancies and it has yet to fail me. I definitely would recommend this a million times over.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Helpful Company
customer_reviews.text: As promised, there was no strong plastic smell which I really appreciated. They give excellent instructions on how to determine which size exercise ball you need, plus color choices, and how to know if it is filled correctly. Also included are directions to exercises that use the exercise ball, although there are plenty of those on YouTube. We bought another one last year from Walmart and it took forever for the plastic smell to go away and it sprung a leak after only a month. Needless to say I’m very happy not to have that same experience with this company.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Currie, Author

customer_reviews.title: Cat Proof?
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for several weeks and my cat hasn't damaged it yet. For under $20, that's a win! I do think I'm going to order a bigger size or try to put more air in this one. I use it for a desk chair and it's just not as high as I'd like it to be. I started using a yoga ball more than three years ago and it's one of the best ideas I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Bold & Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a desk “chair” for my room. It is AWESOME!! We followed the directions, and it worked perfectly. It is the perfect height for me to sit at my desk comfortably. I don’t feel pain in my back after sitting through my 3 hour lecture. HIGHLY recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use at work as a chair replacement, and lasted a few weeks before going back to the chair. I guess that's not for everyone, but that's not a problem with the ball itself. The material feels very heavy duty, and the ball is perfectly round. I followed the instructions and filled to 80% and let it sit overnight, then filled the rest of the way and began using it. The pump worked nice, and the ball holds all the air with no apparent leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality sketchy sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of every ball I received was superb. The problem I ran into was the sizing. The second ball I ordered was 2 sizes too small, I had ordered a 75CM ball but a 55CM ball was packed inside. I've got an 85CM ball from the same company and there's been no quality issues with it so far. I'm above 250lbs and regularly find myself bouncing on it with no problems. Don't even bother trying the hand pump. You will never inflate the ball with it or you will end up with arms like Popeye.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Decent fitness ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball seems like it will last; got it for physical therapy of the back to assist with prescribed exercises. Th pump that comes with it is junk and would have taken forever to inflate this. Would prefer that one is not included and pass along the cost savings. Instead, I used a compressor to inflate the ball and it took just a few minutes. Suggest that anyone who get this also have at least an electric bike pump available for inflation.
customer_reviews.author: Walter W. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically to use for sitting at computer and strengthening some core muscles. I was skeptical, but the directions for inflating were VERY clear, and I had no problems at all. Have had it for several months with no problems whatsoever. I would suggest reading the information on what size to purchase as it is critical if you are using it to sit at a computer. Quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: ... I actually need the bigger ball than what is recommended. Not sure if it is just my preference ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the height guidelines in the picture and I found that I actually need the bigger ball than what is recommended. Not sure if it is just my preference or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Works well as substitute for an office chair where I can also exercise while I work. Extremely comfortable on the bottom. Getting the right diameter of the ball is important. There is probably a personal difference in how much you want to pressurize it. Any ball will at first show creases of the folds that were there during shipment which will disappear. Afterwards you might want to increase the pressure as the height will decrease sightly. There are exercises that you can do with the ball besides sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: James Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Hubby uses it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is an outdoor guy and pulled his back in the field. Doc hooked him up with physical therapy and they got him using a ball like this for home exercises. He has used it everyday and his back has improved. Good construction and easy to inflate with the provided pump. Comes with exercises as well but he uses the ones taught by the therapist. Good buy. Starting to add it to my work out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Venus11

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is sturdy and well made. I've used it for everything from ab work to bench press and it works with little deformation. Supports 250 pounds without any issue at all. Also came with a removal tool and extra plugs which are invaluable as they're nearly impossible to remove on their own. The pump also worked surprisingly well and although I wasn't expecting it to do a good job inflating the ball it went faster and easier than I could have hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Eustace Bagge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stability ball
customer_reviews.text: The package came very quickly. I like the pump that came with the ball. It makes it much easier to inflate than ones you have to use a needle and find your own pump. The ball is really stable and easy to use. I'm following a specific exercise program, but the exercises suggested by Live Infinitely look like they would be effective. An excellent piece of home gym equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Sue

customer_reviews.title: love the ball but the air pump is a an unfunny joke.
customer_reviews.text: i bought the ball so that i could do some of the exercises at therapy at home. the pump would have taken far too long to inflate the ball. just used my air compressor and it was up in about a minute. didn't need a needle just the blow gun attachment. it seems to be very well made and i am very pleased with this purchase. unless you need a very long workout forget the air pump.
customer_reviews.author: grendelskeeper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is fantastic. Some people say they have a problem with the egg or oval shape but i haven’t yet. This may have been cause from not letting the ball stretch for 24hours? The ball looks and feels durable. So far we’re happy with the product and supports the weight of two people. About 330 lbs. of course we had to test it lol. Definately would recommend. It may take others quite a while to pump it up so be prepared to switch arms. Of you have an electric pump definately use it and follow the 24 hour stretch period. Awesome ball just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Seller was awesome though and after I emailed them a picture they ...
customer_reviews.text: When this came it was lopsided and egg shaped when inflated to the correct size. Seller was awesome though and after I emailed them a picture they got a new one out to me the same week. The second ball was perfect and has been in regular use for about a year and I have no complaints. I'm 5'2'' and ordered the 55cm ball and it's perfect for my height.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, very useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased since all gyms are closed for now. I use for abdominal exercises, as well as, some upper/lower body strengthening dumbell exercises. This brand is easy to inflate, strong material construction, and comes with instructions, inflation tools, and pdf of exercises too. The owners thought of everything when packaging this together. I appreciated the instructions and pdf file with various exercises that can be done for all the muscle groups. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use for labor, but baby had other plans. However, it’s very handy to use as a bouncer to calm a fussy baby. The ball seems a bit smaller than what it should be even though I sized up
customer_reviews.author: Clarise Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Great product; but didn't get my workout guides
customer_reviews.text: Love the exercise ball! Can't wait to be able to step up my home work out. I am also planning on getting one for my "office chair" for the added benefits of having a stability ball vs a regular office chair. I would give it 5 stars, but I didn't receive the workout guides with my ball! I was really looking forward to having those to mix up my routines.
customer_reviews.author: IowaKay

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! I bought a different exercise ball from Wal-Mart to use during pregnancy and it would deflate literally overnight. I got this one instead and have only had to pump it up initially and I've had it for about a month now. It's super comfortable to sit/stretch on and no strong plastic smell when you take it out of the box either. Don't waste your time trying to find a better exercise ball than this! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: This truly is "Professional Grade!"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Exercise Ball from 'Live Infinitely' as part of a rehab plan for lower back problems. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and appearance of this exercise ball. It truly is "Professional Grade!" My wife liked it so much that I ordered her on a couple of days later. She Loves it and we now work out together with our 'Live Infinitely' Professional Grade Exercise Balls! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley from TN

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this ball. It was easy to inflate, fun to use, and seems durable enough to last. My only complaint (and it's a small one) is that the color is lighter and pinker than I expected. Had I known this, I might've chosen a different color. But this doesn't affect its effective use for workouts for me, my husband, and even our large dog for her physical therapy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Thick and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is high quality. I had an exercise ball for over 18 years but we didn’t bring it with us when we moved and I quickly realized they don’t make them like they use to. I bought two replacements and they were awful and popped. I order this one to sit on for online college classes and for exercise. It is thick and I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Keeping myself and my kids from the brink of insanity in our small house on rainy days under isolation. Seems to be reducing the stress symptoms they’ve been showing. Has allowed them to be kids off video games and show their imagination as they make ball island to escape to even if for a short while. Doesn’t have a smell and was easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value, But Don't Be In A Rush To Use It
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, sturdy exercise ball at a very competitive price. In addition it comes with all the necessary equipment to use the ball: Pump, inflator pin extractor, extra pins. Everything so far works well and easy to inflate. Just pay attention to the instructions about gently inflating the ball over 2 days so do not expect to use it the same day you get it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, perfect for stretching and I use it for ab exercises. Doesn’t loose air. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: mego1717

customer_reviews.title: Shaped like Humpty Dumpty without pants.
customer_reviews.text: Like many have mentioned here It actually is a stability egg opposed to ball. I strictly followed instructions like everyone here said as well as the instructions and Humpty Dumpty still showed up in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: The ball itself is great quality. Was easy to inflate with very clear instructions and all the parts needed to inflate it for use. I have worked out with it everyday since receiving the ball and it came with a printable PDF containing workout tips. I will buy the stand that is sold separately so that I can get even more use out of it. Works great for rocking babies to sleep as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yves Cedano

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Having been out of action for some time due to arthritis and then having both hips replaced my core has weakened severely. I have had the exercise ball for 2 weeks now and I can already see improvement. Having plenty of time to work on myself now due to self isolation I expect to reap the benefits of using this quality product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ryan West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for me
customer_reviews.text: I had noticed my hips started hurting and I was getting stiff when working long hours at my desk. So, I got this stability ball to work on my balance and core utilizing it as a seat at my desk in my home office! Perfect height for me. The metallic gray is not tacky looking in my home decor. Definitely sturdy construction....would recommend it for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Omnitrition IMA, Authorized Distributor 66351

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still not in labor BUT: 1. The babies head is IN POSITION 2. Its fun to bounce on while pregnant and watching TV 3. I’m sure there are some exercises you can do on it but it’s really just a giant ball for the kids to throw around 4. Too big for the dog’s mouth to get around it and pop (we have a chewy Labrador) 5. Freaking great quality for the price 6. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stability ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 65cm based on height recommendations. I am 5'-2" and really think the 75cm would have worked fine. I have had several other brands in the past that burst. I think that was partly because I over inflated them and didn't follow the instructions of airing it up abt 80%, let it stretch for 24 hours, then air up remainder. I used the hand pump and measured carefully to ensure I didn't over inflate this time. This ball has nice thick material with raised ridge lines around the diameter. This help it grip to the floor better. So far I've had no problems whatsoever. I like to bounce lightly on it while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: cjgma

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: It states that it is durable but it deflated from a hole the first week we had it. We used it in a regular desk type office setting, flat cement floor. I am guessing that something sharp punctured it but considering the environment it had to be something small. As such, I am surprised that it punctured. It obviously isn't as thick as I thought. It was the right size, inflated well, and seemed like it would be good desk chair alternative.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Plus size and this thing rocks
customer_reviews.text: So I'm very plus sized and was worried I would sit on the ball and POP would go the weasel. NOPE I use it all day, everyday and its just like the day I got it. I work from home and the chair I was using hurt my back and would make my legs swell. Sitting on the exercise ball I have no more swelling, no more back pain, and I've lost 5 lbs. I love it and plan on getting 2 more for our gaming room. 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Hella Lovis

customer_reviews.title: durable exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball (65 cm) because my Chiropractor recommended on for my lower back to stretch out. I read the reviews on this one and decided to purchase it. So glad I did. It is very durable and easy to inflate. I have had it about a week and it is as firm as when it was first inflated. Read the direction to inflate it correctly. The company is great too. Sent different exercises to do for different parts or your body. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: claygal

customer_reviews.title: Using it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3 33 weeks pregnant & got the 55cm ball after researching the right size for my height. I probably could’ve gotten the smaller one but it would have had to be inflated all the way. For pregnancy pain relief you want it to be slightly deflated so it cushions more. This is the perfect size. It’s helped with my back and hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: JStar

customer_reviews.title: A great thing to have when you’re stuck indoors
customer_reviews.text: sheltering in place. Needed something to stretch. Received this quickly. It has a small pump but it is absolutely doable easy to inflate even for someone at my age! Really good stretching. A little bit of a learning curve if you try to hold onto nothing while you’re sitting on it. I cannot recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to it. More challenging than I thought it'd be. The pump, though, is a little frail. The "O" ring needs re-thinking. Kept coming loose and had to re-work it back into position while air would escape. Hopefully, the design's still on the drawing board. :0) On the upside, I have another ball from another manufacturer that regularly needs to be refreshed with air. I've not once had to do that with this ball!
customer_reviews.author: RLJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: So nice for back and hip pain once your body adjusts itself, which doesn't seem to take long- one to two uses max, using it for an hour or two at a time. Perfect height for a desk for a person that stands 5'11 and supportive enough for a 300lb man. My arm was so tired after pumping it, but I'm super out of shape lol. Didn't deflate after many uses either.
customer_reviews.author: Christina cline

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I received the ball today; 2 days after ordering. It was VERY easy to inflate especially after watching the YouTube vid for the product. The directions say to inflate to 80%, wait 24 hours and then complete inflation to full diameter so I can’t use it until tomorrow. Will finish my full review after I try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tn Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and functional
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the 95 cm ball. Bought this as a replacement desk chair. Looks like I over-estimated what size I'd need, but it works fine. Great support and durability from what I can tell. I used an electric air mattress pump to inflate and it still took about six minutes. Can't imagine how long it would take to inflate the 95cm ball with the hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I bought this exercise ball to bounce on while holding him and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for exercise but as a means of preserving my sanity and lower back. My newborn spent his first 8 weeks in various states of crying if he was not being bounced. I bought this exercise ball to bounce on while holding him and it works like a charm. Its high quality and I really like the color. It seems to be durable too, I've used it a lot to bounce the baby and its been hauled around our house (including thrown down the staircase multiple times). I'm assuming it would be great for exercise too, someday I'll get around to actually using it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JS5

customer_reviews.title: Still Working
customer_reviews.text: I've had this ball for almost a year now with use anywhere from 3-5 times a week. The ball hasn't had any issues at all and has maintained its shape and is still on it's initial fill of air. I haven't had to add more air to it since I filled it the first time. Definitely better than any other exercise ball that I have had before.
customer_reviews.author: D62917

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller than 55 cm since I'm only 4'9, so I just didn't inflate it as much so it would be smaller - have started using it when I'm watching TV - very happy with the purchase - random tip if you have it available, my husband inflated it with his air compressor and it was done in 30 seconds :) Would recommend purchasing it again
customer_reviews.author: Jill Morton

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a few months, no customer support
customer_reviews.text: i Bought one for my son to use as a desk chair and it lasted 4 months before it burst. Bought another and it lasted less than 6 mos before it also burst. Contacted seller about the warranty but never got a response back.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Ball
customer_reviews.text: I love this workout ball. This ball is very high quality. It is a nice heavy duty ball, the color is vibrant and beautiful! I keep it in my bedroom for a quick AB or leg workout. I am so happy I ordered this ball. Along with the ball you get the pump (indispensable) and access to their website with tons of exercises you can do on the ball. I am so glad I purchased this exercise ball!!
customer_reviews.author: karenann8

customer_reviews.title: Great ball that doesn’t smell!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to relieve sciatic pain due to pregnancy. Solid ball that DOES NOT smell! Purchased other balls and always had to return them due to the smell. Ball really helps relieve my sciatic pain. I’ve also been using this to sit on while wfh and doing a few exercises recommended by my physical therapist.
customer_reviews.author: WLee

customer_reviews.title: Love my ball
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these throughout the years and I have to say that this ball is one of the best for its quality, durability, and ease of directions [yes directions are important b/c if you don't follow them when inflating you can end up with an egg-shaped ball]. The sizing chart was totally accurate, I'm 5'10" and got the 65 cm. Fits perfect for exercise and sitting at my desk as I write this. I've had balls that cost 2x as much fall victim to a rowdy 8yr old puncturing them. This is quite thick so I don't think the same will happen.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value and quality of this product. Easily set up in about five minutes. To ensure appropriate inflation better to wait 24 hours and adjust inflation if necessary - no big deal. Superior customer support. Instructions easy to follow and entirely accurate - even our four year old granddaughter understood how to verify the proper inflation! Hand pump easy to work and incredibly efficient. Recommend this entire package to anyone serious about obtaining a quality physical therapy adjunctive.
customer_reviews.author: TER

customer_reviews.title: Too squishy even when fully inflated.
customer_reviews.text: The material this is made of is very stretchy so the ball squashes a lot more than I wanted, even when filled to the proper diameter. After a few days it then expanded even more (I measured half the circumference with a tape measure to get the right diameter). I would return it but no longer have the box. I ordered a different one, linked below, that is perfect. Stays pretty firm when inflated. I will be using it for fitness, so wanted it firmer, but it would also be good for sitting. Better:
customer_reviews.author: EricTJ

customer_reviews.title: Not awful for the price
customer_reviews.text: This ball is just ehh.. We purchased as a birthing ball and ordered the 65cm size in neon green. I wish I would have ordered the 75cm (as I am 5'10) but color is as described so there's a positive. So far it seems to hold air well and is sturdy. The thing that got me was it arrived with a stain already on it? Seeing that was pretty off putting to me and that is why it gets the lowered star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air very well, deformed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model because the one I wanted was out of stock, and I needed to replace it quickly. I wish I had waited for the other. The packaging and all are so similar that I figured they're probably made by the same supplier. Incredibly close, but when I removed this one from the packaging there were deep creases into the material that haven't gone away after a week of use. Further, I now have to add air almost daily to this one. It's not doing the job, but I'll probably tolerate it awhile before I get upset enough to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I love this exercise ball. It's made of sturdy material. The pump it came with is ok, I'm lucky I have an air compressor at home so inflating was a breeze and only took seconds. I like the E-booklet of exercises you can download from the seller's website. I use it for core exercises, back stretches and a desk chair. My kids love it too! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: This exercise ball is perfect. I have been using it in place of ...
customer_reviews.text: This exercise ball is perfect. I have been using it in place of my desk chair at work for several months now. I have to add air to it about once a month, other wise I have not had any issues. For what it is worth, I am roughly 230lbs and work at a call center that has me sitting for the majority of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Popped after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend as it popped after 6 months. Don’t fall for the unlimited warranty because it sounds good however there are stipulations that do not in fact make it unlimited. Limited warranty would be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Need to have an electronic pump, instead of manual pump to avoid hurting your hands and elbows. However, I love the color and have benefited greatly by the stability of the ball and pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: TKM

customer_reviews.title: Big Guy, Big Ball...
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy 300+ lbs and this ball has not burst yet after months of use so there you go. Quality ball to match with a base of your choice not included but what is included is the pump which works perfectly fine and didn't fall apart still use it to re-inflate the ball every now and then but also good to blow the dust out of your pc or other electronics when you are cleaning them.. All in all great product I will let you know if and when it pops best not to think about such things though also make sure to get the right size ball depending on your height.
customer_reviews.author: Zack B.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: The ball is made from very sturdy material and I had no trouble filling it with the hand pump. I like how you can do ab exercises without having to lie on the floor. There are exercise routines available on line for free which help offer several ways to workout different sets of muscles. I recommend putting the ball on a mat to protect it from items that may be on the floor. I had to contact customer service due to an error in ordering I made and they have been very gracious in helping me fix my error. The customer service is great and the product is very good. I would repurchase this exercise ball.
customer_reviews.author: Hummnbrd97

customer_reviews.title: Can't pump it up
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fill ball to proper size with the enclosed pump, nor with my own electric pump. Kept waiting for the vinyl to expand further, but by the time I gave up, I was three days too late to return the darn thing
customer_reviews.author: PS OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Great Product: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: In an age of information we can not only seek out the best quality products, but also seek out the kinds of companies we want to deal with -- organizations that obviously share our values. Exercise balls have been a part of my workouts for many years -- this one is the evolution of quality, stability and simplicity. And how nice that it comes from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: scott miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I am 33 weeks pregnant and only wish I got this ball sooner. Great for sitting, and doing hip stretches on. The Seller customer service was prompt, friendly and very communicative. Thank you! I am 5'6, 170 lbs (145 pre pregnancy) and got the 65 cm ball. Its the perfect size !
customer_reviews.author: Steph Jose

customer_reviews.title: Thick, heavy ball.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, exactly as pictured. This is a firm ball once blown up. It is thick and holds its shape nicely when sat on. I used it when working at a desk. If you're looking for a firm, heavy ball, this one's for you. If you want a light and thin ball, keep looking. I would order again but don't think I'll need to since I anticipate this will last a long, long time!
customer_reviews.author: Renee G.

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this exercise ball. I have went through 2 top name brand exercise balls and they have both given me issues. This is by far my favorite and exceeded my expectations. I use it everyday to stretch my back. Will definitely be purchasing more items from this awesome company! Their customer service has also been very pleasant. It's hard to find a company that will check up on you and make sure you're having a great experience with their products. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: great product. poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sitting ball as did not find any comfortable chair $500, always have to lean forward. Also to prevent cardiovascular disease, obesity, and strengthen my core. This ball is the only one tried, and is solid, strong. Time will tell. Amazon box was in excellent shape, but the box that the ball was in, was broken in several pieces.
customer_reviews.author: tmj

customer_reviews.title: Not 95 cm
customer_reviews.text: The 95cm ball is supposed to be 37.5" diameter. Even shows it in the picture on the description. It is more like 30" diameter. I'm was going to use this to form the dome on a pizza oven. Don't waste you're time with this one if you're looking for a bigger dome. UPDATE- after the ball is inflated 80% (30" for this one) and allowed to "stretch" for 24 hrs, finish filling the ball until desired diameter. Per Live Infinity. I used a small air compressor to finishing filling the ball to 36".
customer_reviews.author: not

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Follow instructions and don’t fill it to capacity when you get it. Takes a few days for wrinkles to clear up. Been using it regularly during COVID stay at home orders and have had no issues. I use it on a carpet since I’m concerned it could smudge on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, easy to inflate using a compressor, (using the supplied handpump would work I'm sure but take a great deal of time and be a good workout for your hands and arms). I purchased two for placing in our pool for the winter, not exactly what they were designed for but I hope these will stand up to the job better than the cheap pool "pillow" that the pool people sell.
customer_reviews.author: PAH

product_meta.title: Live Infinitely Exercise Ball (55cm-95cm) Extra Thick Professional Grade Balance & Stability Ball- Anti Burst Tested Supports 2200lbs- Includes Hand Pump & Workout Guide Access
feature_bullets: 1 YEAR UNLIMITED WARRANTY - No Hassles, No Gimmicks If you’re not thrilled, simply contact our customer service team and we will make it right!
RESPONSIBLE MATERIALS- Made from Professional Grade PVC material that can support 2200Lbs are nontoxic, BPA, Latex, heavy metal and phthalate FREE. Safe for you and your family!
ANTI-BURST TESTED- Heavy duty PVC non-slip ridge guarantees every ball can withstand up to a 2cm cut without explosively deflating. Strongest on the market!
BACK RELIEF- Perfect to improved posture and to relieve lower back pain. Use for home exercise, yoga, pregnancy or to improve your core strength. Great for desk chair replacements!
ALL INCLUSIVE – Includes hand pump, 2 air plugs & valve remover tool. Get instant access to our digital exercise guides and online training workouts that are all mobile friendly

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
